channel.title: Extra HD
channel.description:
I'm running out of disk space, and I don't want to delete anything. I still have this second computer, but I dont want to get rid of it completely. So I have a third computer, that has a 4gb HD. My plan is to put the 4gb HD into my second computer, and put the HD from the second computer into my first computer. But I have some questions:
The 4gb HD has windows 95 on it, and I want xp on it. How do I format it and get xp on it? Just with the winxp cd?
Can I just put in the HD from the second computer into the first one, without reformatting it? Because it still has winxp on it, and will that cause any problems? I think it wont.
I think my answers are right, but just to be sure I post my questions here. I don't want to end up destroying 3 HD's.
Thanks in advance.

item.title: Extra HD
item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

You misread that, the 4gb one will replace the big one that I will put into my main computer.

Read full topic

item.title: Extra HD
item.dc:creator: @Mr.Chris Mr.Chris
item.description:
@Mr.Chris wrote:

Buy a 250GB HD for like £80. That would be better than putting a 4GB one in…

Read full topic
